starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. "We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. At the Detroit auto show last week, Sergio Marchionne said offering both minivans in Chrysler dealerships is confusing to customers. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler Group LLC is developing a new frame that can be used for minivans
